name: Embedded Smart Vision for Human and Detection and Counting
message:
This is my graduated project. My group uses Jetson Nano with object detection model
named 'YOLOv5' to detect intruder in restricted area and notify users when intruders have been detected. 
      Moreover we store every intruders data in google sheet and sqlite3 database.

name: Iss detection
message:
This is my Python projects that will using REST API to detect ISS current location and compare with 
      specific location. Also sending some notify if ISS is so close to my specific location.

name: Synchronous speed calculation
message:
This is my tkinter framework project. In this projects is using for calculating synchronous 
      speed by using tkinter responsive window.

name: Rain detection
message:
This projects will using REST API to get rain data from specific position in next 12 hours 
      and notify to sms if the rain will occur.
